definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: prostrate oneself in worship (only Is 44, Is 46) (perh. Aram. loan-word in Heb., cf. Nö:ZMG xli (1887), 719; Aram. [[סְגֵב]], sged, so OAram. [[סגד]], sgd0 (Sachau) Lzb:328; Eth. sgad: all id.; Ar. sajada be lowly, submissive, prostrate oneself in prayer, etc., masjidun mosque, Nab. [[מסגדא]] shrine (?) Lzb:152. 328, Syr. masgdo0 = Ar.; cf. We:Skizzen iii. 165; Heid. 141);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יִסְגּוֹד לוֹ]] Is 44:17 Kt he prostrateth himself to it (an idol; Qr [[יִסְגׇּד־לוֹ]]; + [[יִשְׁתַּחוּ]], [[יִתְפַּלֵּל]]); [[וַיִּסְגׇּד־לָָמוֹ]] v:Is 44:15 (‖[[וַיִּשְׁתָָּחוּ]]); 1 S. [[לְבוּל עֵץ אֶסְגּוֹד]] v:Is 44:19; 3 mpl. [[יִסְגְּדוּ]] [[אַף־יִשְׁתַּחֲווּ]] Is 46:6 (abs.).—Cf. BAram. [[סְגִד]].
